import {React, useState} from 'react' const ProductCard = ({products}) => { // const [cproduct, setCproduct] = useState(null) if(!products) return 'Loading.....' // console.log(cproduct) return ( <>
{products.map(product => (
{product.productName}

{product.productVersion}

{`${product.productPrice}/- Rs`}
))}
) } export default ProductCard
